title: Hanaukyou Maid-tai: La Verite (Hanaukyo Maid Team: La Verite)
synopsis: After his mother passes away, Taro Hanaukyo is invited to his grandfather's home. There, he meets a beautiful maid named Mariel and finds out that his grandfather has retired to a remote island and has given him ownership of his estate. Taro also discovers that not only is the estate a colossal mansion, it has hundreds of gorgeous maids ready to serve him 24 hours a day, seven days a week.
characters: ['Mariel', 'Hanaukyou, Tarou', 'Suzuki, Ikuyo', 'Ichigo, Sango and Ringo', 'Tsurugi, Konoe', 'Yashima, Sanae', 'Landlavizar, Cynthia', 'Jihiyou, Ryuuka', 'Grace']
